name: Domain of Blessing: Seven Senses IV
description:
Bandits from the sea of sand lurk within this Domain.
Use your understanding of the secrets of the elements to defeat them and obtain the precious artifacts stored here.
disorder: All party members' Elemental Mastery is increased based on 10% of the entire party's combined Elemental Mastery. This effect will be refreshed every 20s after recalculation.
